body.p: The IFRIC was told that there was significant diversity in the measurement of the following types of non‑reciprocal distributions of assets by an entity to its owners acting in their capacity as owners:

li.p: distributions of non‑cash assets (eg items of property, plant and equipment, businesses as defined in IFRS 3, ownership interests in another entity or disposal groups as defined in IFRS 5 Non‑current Assets Held for Sale and Discontinued Operations) to its owners; and
distributions that give owners a choice of receiving either non‑cash assets or a cash alternative.
